90 /*
91  * Enum for the type of MIB's parameter
92  */
93 
94 typedef enum {INTEGER, STRING, T_INTEGER, T_STRING} type;
95 
96 /*
97  * Structure of a MIB's parameter
98  */
99 
100  /*
101  * The member "_value" of the structure parameter should be an union as it can be several different type, int, int*, char*, char**
102  * When the code is extand to initialize the MIB, it is adviced to add the differents type of value needed in this union
103  */
104 
105 typedef union{
106  int int_val;
107  int* array_int_val;
108  char* string_val;
109  char** array_string_val;
110 }value;
111 
112 typedef struct {
113  char* _name; /*name of the parameter as it is stored in the vivoe-mib.conf file*/
114  int _type; /*type of the parameter: INT or STRING*/
115  int _optional;/*Specify of the parameter is optional or not (can be leaved empty, or should have a default value: 1 it is optional, 0 it is mand.*/
116  value _value; /*the value of tha parameter*/
117  gboolean _mainenance_group;
118 }parameter;
119 
120 /*
121  * Define the structure for the MIB Groups: deviceInfo, VideoControl, ChannelGroup, VivoeNotification
122  */
123 typedef struct {
124  parameter* parameters; /*an array of the different parameter that belong to the group*/
125  int number; /*the number of parameters in that group*/
126 }MIB_group;
127
